pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fuzzy Logic Toolkit for R // Design and simulate fuzzy logic systems using Type 1 Fuzzy Logic. This toolkit includes with graphical user interface (GUI) and an adaptive neuro-fuzzy inference system (ANFIS). This toolkit is a continuation from the previous package ('FuzzyToolkitUoN'). Produced by the Intelligent Modelling Analysis Group, University of Nottingham.
